title: Interpretation of a dream about a green snake by Ibn Sirin and leading jurists

preview.html: What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of a dream about a green snake? Interpretation of a dream about a green snake in a dream: What is the most accurate interpretation of this symbol? Does the size of the snake change in a dream? Does a two-headed snake look different from a one-headed snake? If you are confused about what this tent means, you will find its clearer meanings in the following article. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake. A green snake in a dream is a warning that the dreamer may be jealous of the people he will meet soon, and to protect himself from this envy, jurists advised him to read dhikr and observe all religious rituals such as prayer, reading the Qur’an, and more. Whoever sees himself in the mirror as if he is A green snake, then he must fear God in himself and in the people he mixes with and deals with because he is a hypocritical person and convinces others that he has good intentions and the devil can whisper to him. He harms those around him, and if he strays on this wrong path, his end will be torment and fire. When a fortuneteller controls a green snake, he is controlling an evil woman in reality and will not allow her to harm him. If the dreamer cuts the tongue of a living snake in a dream and sees it in pain, then he will quarrel with A sharp-tongued woman uses her weapon to resist her, and the quarrel ends in her favor. When a green snake wraps around the dreamer and hurts him, he falls into the trap of his life because of a lying and deceitful woman. However, if he kills this snake and frees himself from its siege on him, this is a sign of victory over him. The evil woman in life. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin developed a unified interpretation of snakes, serpents and serpents and said that they are enemies of relatives, friends or colleagues of the fortuneteller. If the dreamer sees a green snake entering his house without being noticed by anyone from his family, this is a warning from God to him that there is a woman She hates him and hates the interconnectedness and love that unites him in his family, and she will conquer. Its peculiarity to destroy his life and make him live in trouble. When you see a live or green snake in a dream that causes the death of the dreamer, the dream indicates harm and means the victory of the dreamer’s enemies over him, and perhaps the woman will succeed in harming him and involving him in a disaster. If the dreamer cuts off the head of the snake while attacking him, then this The scene shows his strength and ability to resist his enemies and he will win over them in a short time. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake for a single woman: When an unmarried woman sees her friend turning into a green snake, this is a clear warning about the intention of this friend and her intense hatred for the dreamer, and it is clear that the dreamer is close to God because he warns her against those around her. she. Even if they are the closest people to her. If an unmarried woman dreams of a green snake that has turned black, this is a sign that the hypocrites in her life will appear as they really are, and soon she will be surprised by their bad behavior and bad words, and she must be prepared for anything. Confrontation with them. If an unmarried woman sees a green snake biting her neck or back, the jurists said that this dream indicates a painful betrayal that the dreamer experienced. And if the snake has two heads, one of which is green

title: Interpretation of a dream about live fish for a married man

preview.html: But seeing fish in a dream is a different matter. Some commentators said it was good news and there were many interpretations about seeing fish alive or dead. Today, from your website gptafser.com/, we will discuss the interpretation of a dream about a live fish for a married person and other people.Interpretation of seeing live fish in a dream for a single girlThe unmarried girl sees in her dreams live fish.The indication of her vision is that soon she will receive happy news in her life that will delight In the event that an unmarried girl sees a live fish in her dream and the girl is in the educational stage. Her vision indicates that she will attain great joy, which is the joy of her success in her academic life. If an unmarried girl sees a live fish in her dream. The vision shows that the girl will soon achieve all Her dreams, which she dreamed of achieving throughout her life, by God’s command. Seeing fish in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that the girl will soon obtain a high position. The vision may indicate that she will be promoted and transformed into a high position and great status. As for an unmarried girl, she will see fish in her dream. And it was cooked. Her vision is an indication that she will soon hear happy news. Her engagement or proposal to marry a young man with narrow morals may be by order of God Almighty. A single girl seeing in her dream that she is eating fish while she is alive. The function of her vision is that she will go through a great emotional shock. In her life. It has an impact on her mental and physical condition and everyone around her notices this change. See also: A black fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing live fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing live fish in a married woman’s dream. An indication of the goodness that distinguishes this dreamer, and that God will provide for her. With goodness, livelihood and blessings in her life. But if a married woman sees in her dream a live fish. Her vision indicates that she is living a stable life full of happiness and peace with her family members. If a married woman dreams that she is taking a fish while it is alive. The dream indicates that she will give birth. Soon a beautiful child. Seeing a married woman preparing fish for her family in a dream. A vision that indicates that the married woman will attend a party in her home for a happy occasion. Soon, God willing, she will invite her family, relatives, and loved ones to it. If you see her in a dream, she is cleaning fish. It is a sign for the married woman that she is preparing In her next life, it will be an occasion that will be the reason for her happiness, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a live fish in a dream for a man and its meaning is seeing a married man in a dream of a live fish. Some scholars have interpreted it as good news for the dreamer, because God will secure his livelihood and the abundance of money and blessings in his life, God willing. But if A person dreamed of fish in a dream and took pearls and took them out of his stomach. The man’s vision indicates abundant sustenance for him and his family through his wife. If a married man dreams that he catches a live fish, but finds that the fish he caught does not have scales. This is an unfavorable vision because it indicates that he One of the characters that carries unfavorable characteristics. Such as his betrayal of the people around him and being a lowly person. Seeing a married man in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Raad in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Ra’ad in a dream or a dream via the website see roy2a.com. Surah Al-Ra’ad is a political surah with 43 verses found in the thirteenth part. It was revealed after Surat Muhammad and is ranked in the Holy Qur’an as number 13. The speech in the surah revolves around the power of truth. The weakness of falsehood and seeing Surah Al-Ra’d in a dream, and the evidence of this dream on the ground, today we will explain the most important interpretations that came from the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen on this topic, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ra’d in a dreamSeeing Surat Al-Ra’d in a dream can be A warning of bad weather conditions and bad weather conditions for the viewer. Seeing Surah Al-Ra’ad in a dream indicates that there are dangers to which the viewer may be exposed, such as weapons and projectiles. Reading Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream could be a sign of the insight’s salvation from all these dangers, whether they are worldly, a change in the atmosphere, or with Wars. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’d in a dream for married couples is an indication of the permissible marital relationship that exists between them. If the dreamer hears Surat Al-Ard in his dream, and whoever reads it has a bad voice, this indicates defeating enemies or harming God. Surah Al-Ra’d in a dream in an undesirable way, or that the fortuneteller found it written in a way. Bad, referring to what is forbidden in the marital relationship between spouses. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that he saw Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream is an indication that the dreamer memorizes supplications in his time of need and that he often pleads for God. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream is an indication that the fortuneteller will grow gray hair, meaning that he will grow old. Reading Surah Al-Ra’ad in a dream indicates that the dreamer is in a good position, and will not be persecuted by the oppressor, nor persecuted by the ruler. Seeing Surah Al-Ra’d in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s return to His Lord and His acceptance, and that He is among those accepted in this world and the hereafter. Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream. The meaning of prayer is answered. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream is a sign of the sincerity of a Muslim’s work and the fulfillment of promises between him and his Lord. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Isra in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ra’d in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a woman For an unmarried woman, Surat Al-Ra’d in a dream indicates her urgent appeal to accept an invitation that she hopes will succeed in reality. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a single woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a girl’s dream indicates fear of the fluctuations in conditions around her. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ra’d in a dream. For a married woman: A married woman’s vision of Surat al-Ra’ad in a dream indicates her marital relationship with her husband. If she hears or reads it in a strange voice, or worse, a warning against the forbidden actions that occur in this marital relationship. Reading Surah al-Ra’ad in a dream for a married woman indicates an abundance of supplications and sympathy to God. In her affairs. Seeing Surat Al-Ra’ad in a dream indicates one voice for a married woman, and everyone who is waiting for news of her mother-in-law is good news of her imminent pregnancy, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of dynamite in a dream - seeing dynamite in a dream

preview.html: A dream about dynamite for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man who either lit or detonated the dynamite and bombs according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and others. Interpretations in continuation of the topicInterpretation of dynamite in a dreamSeeing dynamite in a dream indicates an imminent expanding change in affairs. If dynamite scares you, this indicates that a hidden enemy is working against you, and if you are not careful in your behavior, he will reveal himself in an unexpected and desperate moment.Seeing dynamite In a dream it has many meanings, for example, having dynamite in a dream indicates the fact that you have the ability to overcome any obstacle that stands in your way. If used correctly, this power can help you on your journey. If used incorrectly, it can harm you and everyone around you. If you dream that someone else has dynamite, this could be a warning that they are keeping a secret or some other information that can ultimately destroy you or your relationship with them. If you see dynamite lit And ready to explode, it means that there is some kind of danger coming in your near future. Seeing dynamite in dreams indicates the changes that the dreamer will bring about in his life. These changes can be tangible or physical, such as rearranging your home furniture, updating your wardrobe, cutting your hair, or any other change in a person's personal appearance. The changes can be larger life choices, such as changing your job, or moving to A new home, or moving to a new city (or even a new country). Seeing dynamite in your dream is associated with pain or strong emotions, perhaps past experiences, that may explode into serious consequences in your life. This is likely related to a past trauma that has been created or misunderstood, and if this past trauma is triggered, it may be an emotional bomb for the dreamer, revealing other issues that the dreamer may have avoided dealing with. Dream interpreters agree that dynamite is a sign of change, but the context Dynamite and its condition in dreams are crucial to understanding its meaning. In some cases, dynamite can be a harbinger of bad change. Interpretation of dynamite exploding in a dreamFor example, if you see dynamite exploding in your dream, it may unfortunately be a sign of difficult times. This explosion in a dream may indicate slander, accidents, health problems, or the dreamer falling into evil crowds. If the dreamer is not harmed or harmed in any way by this explosion, then he will be able to overcome the challenges and difficult times that lie ahead of him. If the dreamer is already going through difficult times in his life, walking away from the dynamite explosion is cathartic. It is a sign that any difficulties encountered will be reduced, illnesses will be treated and overall success will increase. If dynamite explodes in a destructive way and causes damage to the dream environment, it may also indicate disappointment. This may indicate that the dreamer should take action to protect something or someone and serve as a warning sign for blood

title: Interpretation of a dream about turning the head into an animal or bird in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a headband in a dream. A head injury in a dream. Seeing a severed head in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a head in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of an opening in the head. Headband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of tying the head. Interpretation of pain coming out of the head in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, stated that changing the head in a dream is a condition that expresses a change in the dreamer’s life. The reality is that the dreamer will experience a new reality in the coming days after witnessing any situation. From changing the head in his dream and transforming it from what it is in reality to any other body, whether it becomes like the head of an animal or a bird, whether it is large or small, and with regard to this new thing in reality, the dreamer may find happiness, comfort and pleasure in it, or he will face anxiety and fatigue. And distress, and in this matter we will talk in more detail about the cases. Imam Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in his dream that his head has changed from its natural shape to become like the head of one of the animals that has power and imposes it on other animals such as the lion, the tiger. , elephant, wolf, fox and other types of animals, then this status indicates the power you have. The Imam also said elsewhere that this vision may indicate the victory and victory that the dreamer achieves in his reality and the dominance of his enemy and opponent if he has opponents and enemies in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that his head has changed from its previous state and has become like the head of a dog, horse, donkey, or... A sheep or any other walking animal that the fortuneteller knows in his daily life, its vision may indicate: exhaustion, exhaustion and pressure that the dreamer is exposed to in his daily life and that he will be limited and his freedom depends on some people. As for the one who sees in his dream that his head has become the head of a bird or A game or something else, such as a falcon, an eagle, a bird, or a dove. This dream is considered an indication of the dreamer’s condition due to his many travels. In real life, they move between countries constantly, and God knows best. In any case, Imam Ibn Shirin did not differentiate, so he explained whether these birds are prey or not in the interpretation, as they all fly and fly and have the ability to travel and move from one place to another. Dream of removing head lice - YouTube

Imam Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in his dream that his head has changed from its natural shape to become like the head of one of the animals that has power and imposes it on other animals such as the lion, the tiger. , elephant, wolf, fox and other types of animals, then this status indicates the power you have. The Imam also said elsewhere that this vision may indicate the victory and victory that the dreamer achieves in his reality and the dominance of his enemy and opponent if he has opponents and enemies in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that his head has changed from its previous state and has become like the head of a dog, horse, donkey, or... A sheep or any other walking animal that the fortuneteller knows in his daily life, its vision may indicate: exhaustion, exhaustion and pressure that the dreamer is exposed to in his daily life and that he will be limited and his freedom depends on some people. As for the one who sees in his dream that his head has become the head of a bird or A game or something else, such as a falcon, an eagle, a bird, or a dove. This dream is considered an indication of the dreamer’s condition due to his many travels. In real life, they move between countries constantly, and God knows best. In any case, Imam Ibn Shirin did not differentiate, so he explained whether these birds are prey or not in the interpretation, as they all fly and fly and have the ability to travel and move from one place to another. Dream of removing head lice - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman: As it is known that harassment in real life is one of the things that causes stress for many girls, and of course seeing it in a dream is also one of the things that causes anxiety, such as an explanation through dream interpreters that include many interpretations and explanations, the difference depends. On the social status of the person who sees this dream, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman.Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman, especially since such a dream in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of the problems and troubles that she faces in her life, and it is one of the dreams. Troublesomeness that often includes bad interpretations, and in this context we offer you the interpretation of seeing harassment in a single woman’s dream, which is: If an unmarried woman sees harassment in a dream, this is evidence that she is exposed to bad and bad words from the people around her. And also to see harassment in A dream by someone who knows an unmarried girl. It is a warning from him and an indication of the need to avoid this person in reality. And if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that someone she knows is mistreating her, and she is happy about it. It is evidence of this girl’s misbehavior, and evidence of a forbidden act. Males, God forbid. Seeing harassment in a dream by an unknown person for a single woman. It portends many problems and accusations directed at the girl that may affect her reputation, God forbid. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the top interpreters for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about escaping harassment, and this dream is Which includes many interpretations and interpretations that usually differ depending on who sees this dream and what are the details he sees in his dream, and many interpreters have worked hard to explain it, and in this context we put you to the interpretation of the dream of escaping harassment, which is: The harasser escaping in a dream is a sign of... Escaping from a difficult problem he faced in his life. Also, seeing a pregnant woman dreams that she is escaping harassment. This indicates that she will give birth naturally and easily, God willing, and will give birth to a beautiful and healthy child. Also, seeing a woman in a dream escaping harassment shows her ability to face difficulties, It also shows that she will overcome it, God willing. Seeing in a dream a divorced woman running away from harassment. It is evidence of his ability to overcome all the difficulties he faced in life. It also indicates the woman’s ability to get rid of all the debts and financial crises that she experienced in her life. See Also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing robes in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, for married and single women. Interpretation of seeing a brother assaulting an unmarried sister.. Seeing harassment in a dream. It is one of the disturbing dreams for many girls, which, according to many dream interpreters, includes bad interpretations, and here in the context we put the interpretation Dreams for a brother who abuses an unmarried sister, which is: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her brother is mistreating her and attacking her in a dream. This dream will be evidence that he will face problems.

title: Interpretation of marriage and intercourse in a dream

preview.html: Watching sex for a single girl married to a pregnant woman, whether with a known or unknown person, with the wife or lover, or a man with a man, or incest with the family or brother or father and mother Interpretation of Ibn Sirin's close relationship Scholars and interpreters of dreams such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi and others say that seeing marriage and intercourse has many connotations that differ according to the situation and who does such a thing in the dream. The result of this intercourse, and it was also said that the feeling of pleasure and intense lust in the dream as a result of intercourse in the dream has a deep meaning in the interpretation. But the young man and the young man must know that there is a difference between seeing intercourse in a dream and in a dream, because seeing intercourse in a dream without a man or a young man having a dream actually means seeing and dreaming. But the dream is a dream that has nothing to do with interpretation and vision. Seeing intercourse and intercourse with the wife in a dream If the husband sees himself having sex and marrying his wife in a dream, as he does with her in reality and reality, this is interpreted as treating his wife with justice and kindness that pleases God. And misguidance does not follow the matters of the Sunnah and its rulings. And seeing a man marrying and having intercourse with his wife while she is menstruating, this alerts the man that his wife is actually forbidden to him because of a vow or will issued by one of them and left her. Seeing a man in a dream having sex with a woman known to him Seeing a man having intercourse with the wife of another man he knows, such as his wife, friend or relative, who is a man he knows, symbolizes the husband of that woman and shows that this husband gets money and affection from the wife, and this also mentions that the husband seeing another person having sex and marrying his wife in a dream symbolizes the appearance of this man with money and goods or a large profit in trade, and seeing a man connecting his wife with his neighbor in a dream. It symbolizes that this man has bad morals and does not recognize religion, customs or traditions and does not maintain morals and principles in the sanctity of the neighbor and others. Seeing a man having sex with another man in a dream As for the man who sees himself having sex with another man, seeing a man having intercourse with another man indicates good that the fortune teller will receive, and seeing the fortune teller having intercourse with another man symbolizes the money, service or good that this man enjoys. He gets from the fortune teller, or a sign. In the joy and happiness of the relief, and seeing a man marrying someone he knows, this indicates signs of friendship, love and respect between the two peoples or meeting these two people in an unpleasant matter. Seeing incest in a dream A man's marriage to his mother portends his death and the fulfillment of his condition, and this is if the man sees a liquid coming out of him after marriage only in a dream, but if it is without ejaculation, it symbolizes the disobedient son. And the separation of kinship, and seeing incestuous marriage such as a sister or others may indicate a forbidden child or disputes and separation of the relationship. Following the Sunnah of the Prophet and not maintaining the principles of Sharia and religion. Seeing intercourse and intercourse with a virgin and a girl in a dream Seeing that a man has sex with a virgin and a virgin girl and her virginity is broken indicates his marriage to a beautiful woman or gaining good and abundant money, and seeing the marriage of a black girl portends calamity and distress

In trade, seeing a man tying his wife to his female neighbor in a dream. It symbolizes that this man has bad morals and does not recognize religion, customs, or traditions, and does not maintain morals and principles in the sanctity of his neighbor and others. Seeing a man having sex with another man in a dream. As for a man who sees himself having sex with another man, seeing a man having intercourse with another man It indicates goodness that the fortuneteller will obtain, and seeing the fortuneteller having intercourse with another man symbolizes the money, service, or goodness that this man enjoys. Gets from a fortune teller, or sign. In the joy and happiness, and seeing a man marrying someone he knows, this indicates signs of friendship, love, and respect between the two peoples, or a meeting between these two people in an unpleasant matter. Following the Sunnah of the Prophet and not adhering to the principles of Sharia law and religion. Seeing a virgin and a girl having intercourse and intercourse in a dream. Seeing a man having sex with a virgin and a virgin girl and having her virginity broken indicates that he will marry a beautiful woman or gain good and abundant money. Seeing a black girl marrying portends calamity and distress.

title: I dreamed that I was eating and did not get enough in the dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I was eating and was not full in the dream. Dreams carry different meanings, so we know by what they convey. I dreamed that I was eating and did not get enough in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating and did not get enough in a dream. If the dreamer sees Oneself eats and is not satisfied, as it may express lack and instability, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating green parsley in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating green parsley in a dream can lead to profit, God willing. When you see a single girl eating green parsley in a dream, this may indicate profits, and God knows best. The Unseen: If a divorced woman sees green parsley in a dream, this may mean that she has reached a high position, and God knows best. When a married woman sees green parsley in a dream, this may represent stability, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating until one is full in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating until one is full in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing food and being full and not wanting to eat may be a sign that you are spending money on things that are not good, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees fullness, it may be a sign of health for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If she sees An unmarried girl is full in a dream, this can lead to enjoying luxury, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating with pleasure in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that she eats with joy in a dream can be an indication of the good that she will achieve, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating happily, This may be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. If an unmarried girl is seen eating happily in a dream, this may indicate happiness, and God knows best. If a married man is seen eating happily, this may lead him to a good position, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating with my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating. With my mother in a dream. Perhaps it concerns the honor of the mother by the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen eating with her mother, this may be a sign of honoring her mother, and God knows best. If an unmarried young man dreams of eating with his mother, this may be a sign of goodness and justice. Also, Eating with my mother in a dream can mean honoring the mother, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating blindfolded in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating blindfolded in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that eating bananas can lead to the strength of faith, and God knows best. When you see a married woman eating bananas, this may indicate sustenance, God willing. In the event that you see a young man eating bananas, it may express goodness and livelihood for you, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of eating with A prince in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating with a prince in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations

title: Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com. Valleys are a low natural basin that illuminates the earth and extends between plains and plateaus and the flow of rivers and streams in it. It is fertile land suitable for agriculture, and seeing natural manifestations in a dream is one of the things that gives psychological comfort and is considered The sightings are good and have many effects, and today we will present the most important interpretations of major interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen about. Seeing a valley in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream. Seeing a green valley in a dream is a sign of love, peace, and psychological comfort. Seeing bathing in the valley in a dream indicates good luck and success. And listening to the fortuneteller’s vow. Falling into the valley refers to exhaling needs and achieving what the viewer seeks. Digging a valley in a dream indicates the death of one of the monarch’s loved ones. Seeing the great valley in a dream indicates knowledge, knowledge, money and abundant food. Seeing a lot of water in the valley indicates the dreamer’s health and long life. Your vision It falls into the valley without harming the viewer. It indicates a source of livelihood that will worry him because he does not know the people around him, such as inheritance. If someone sees that he is lost in the valley and does not know a way to reach it, it is a sign of death. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a green orchard in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. He says Ibn Sirin said that seeing a valley in a dream is one of the noble visions that indicate the strength of faith and closeness to God through knowledge and knowledge. Seeing a valley with water flowing through it is a sign of victory after defeat and the dreamer’s ability to submit to his enemies and those who persecute him. Seeing a dry valley without water and agriculture indicates a dream about being in prison. Death and illness. Seeing yourself walking in a green valley in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enjoy the dream and prosperity in his life and future. Seeing the valley dirty like a swamp in a dream is a bad dream that indicates extreme poverty and illness. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a green snake in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream for a woman Single Woman: Seeing a single woman walking in a green valley indicates prosperity, kindness, and good news that awaits her in her future. Seeing drinking water from a valley in a dream means for a girl to fulfill wishes and success that will follow her in her life. Seeing a girl walking in a valley in a dream indicates that the date of her engagement is approaching. Seeing impure water in the valley In a girl’s dream, it refers to the worries and anxiety that she suffers from. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing green mint in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream for a married woman. Seeing running water in the valley for a married woman indicates her closeness to God, her obedience to her husband, and her good qualities. Seeing yourself crossing the valley in a dream indicates a married woman’s ability to She takes responsibility for her home and always tries to get out of crises. Seeing a beautiful valley with water and crops indicates a married woman’s dream about the comfort of life and her husband obtaining high positions and ample livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a valley in a dream for a pregnant woman
